title: Cant right click in the client?
body: ^ Title. I cant right click people to inv or send a msg to them or anything. Just randomly started. Is there anything I can do to fix this?

replies.body:
That's really odd!  But right clicking works elsewhere?  Do you have another mouse you might be able to troubleshoot with, to rule out a possible hardware issue?  Try a config rest as well in case your input is not reading properly anymore:

Log into the game client.
Navigate to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Config
Delete the file  named **game.cfg** and **persistedsettings.json**
Go into a custom game and verify that settings have saved properly.  Leave game to sync settings. 

I hope that helps!
